name: Mouse Cursors (Variants)
description:
Mouse cursors component set, that are based off of cursor CSS properties, as well as macOS cursors.

  • Names/Descriptions are referenced from Mozilla's cursor docs.


~ Inspired by other community resources, and combined my favorite ideas into this one file. Enjoy!


Updates

02/24/22

  • Annotated category types next to component set
  • Fixed ordering and names of variant properties
